text.section: The Secretary shall register each applicant who meets the requirements of this subtitle.

For all registrations other than temporary registrations, the Secretary shall issue to each registrant a pocket identification card that includes:
a photograph of the registrant, supplied by the registrant; and
the expiration date of the registrant's registration.
Each registrant shall give the Secretary written notice of any change of address within 10 business days after the change.
